Package shopping_cart

Interface Cart

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemManagement
public interface Cart

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2019 / 2020

The "contract" that says which operations has to be available to handle a data structure used to store items

Authors:

  • @author Ricardo Santos
  • @author Bruno Oliveira
  • @author Fábio Silva
  • @author João Ramos
  • @author Óscar Oliveira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Item item)
    Adds a item to the data structure used to store items.
    int numberOfItems()
    Returns the sum of each item item quantity for the itens in the data structure used to store items
    void printAll()
    Prints all items and respective quantity, stored in the data structure used to store items
    boolean remove​(java.lang.String reference)
    Removes the item (regardless the item quantity from the data structure used to store items with provided reference .
    boolean removeUnit​(java.lang.String reference)
    Removes one unit of item with provided reference from the data structure used to store items.

  • Method Details

    • add

      boolean add​(Item item)
      Adds a item to the data structure used to store items. If the item does not exist, sets the quantity equals to 1. If the item exists, then the quantity value is incremented
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be added
      Returns:
      true if the item has been added/updated, otherwise false

    • removeUnit

      boolean removeUnit​(java.lang.String reference)
      Removes one unit of item with provided reference from the data structure used to store items. If the quantity is equal to 0, then the item should be removed
      Parameters:
      reference - The reference to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the item/quantity has been removed, otherwise false

    • remove

      boolean remove​(java.lang.String reference)
      Removes the item (regardless the item quantity from the data structure used to store items with provided reference .
      Parameters:
      reference - The reference to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the item has been removed, otherwise false

    • numberOfItems

      int numberOfItems()
      Returns the sum of each item item quantity for the itens in the data structure used to store items
      Returns:
      the sum of each item item quantity

    • printAll

      void printAll()
      Prints all items and respective quantity, stored in the data structure used to store items
